nodes.text: Mikhtor Doss's mercenaries were a group of mercenaries led by Mikhtor Doss. About eight months after Battle of Yavin they were involved in a plot to capture five rogue stormtroopers, known as the Hand of Judgment, and put them out of commission. The plan was made by Bok Yost and worked well before Mara Jade, Emperor's Hand, got involved and rescued the stormtroopers killing Doss and several of his companions.
